song.title: Sometimes
song.lyrics:
Large fingers pushing paint You're god and you've got big hands The colors blend... the challenges you give man
Seek my part... devote myself My small self... like a book amongst the many on a shelf Sometimes I know, sometimes I rise Sometimes I fall, sometimes I don't Sometimes I cringe, sometimes I live Sometimes I walk, sometimes I kneel Sometimes I speak of nothing at all Sometimes I reach to myself, dear god
